'''''"All We Need Is Some Firewood and Some Vinegar..."''''' is an [[achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open the door after finding the [[Mine Passageway]] between [[The Chasm: Main Mining Area]] and [[Tiangong Gorge]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The Achievement's name is derived from the Chinese concept of the {{Lang|{{w|seven necessities}}|zh=開門七件事|zh_lit=seven items (needed) to open a door}}, which comprises firewood, rice, oil, salt, sauce, vinegar and tea.
